title: What's your best weird yet fun build?
body:
For me it has to be my "$%&* ton of HP" Sion build.

{{champion:14}} {{item:3047}}{{item:3748}}{{item:3022}}{{item:3083}}{{item:3065}}{{item:3742}}

replies.body:
Crit Garen
{{champion:86}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3812}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3147}}
More like one punch Garen

Life Steal {{champion:2}} 
{{item:3006}} {{item:3074}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3812}} {{item:3065}} 
Life Steal Quints
Warlord's Bloodlust and Vampirism

During W:
107% at 100% Health and 196% at 2% Health (if W and Spirit Visage is multiplicative)
This life steal applies completely to the damage being dealt by BorK and half applies to the damage dealt from Ravenous Hydra. Olaf will also heal from damage dealt through his Q due to Death's Dance. This will be boosted to between 6.25% of the damage dealt from his Q to 9.3% of the damage dealt from his Q.

{{champion:105}} with {{item:3124}} {{item:3115}} {{item:3165}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3089}} and the old devourer

It was hilarious when I literally deleted a full tank mundo in less than three seconds with that build

{{champion:432}} {{item:3115}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3145}} 

Burst Bard. It's hilarious to watch.

Have you heard of.... FULLAD ASSASSIN! {{champion:39}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3147}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3074}} 

Q's that hit for about 1000 damage
I prefer attack speed Sion with the old devourer.

{{champion:157}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3026}} 

late game is actually insane.
{{champion:99}} {{item:1402}} {{item:3508}} {{item:3115}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3031}} . I don't understand why, but this can somehow solo elder dragon.
rageblade+litchbane+nashors tooth on bard, land q snd attack twice.  chunks them then keep attacking to get rageblade charged

{{champion:412}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3094}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3147}} +tank items. This build in ARAM is really enjoyable.
{{champion:96}} {{item:3042}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3085}}  Literal, overkill.
{{champion:134}} {{item:3042}} Syndra ult is single target. Adds like 600 ad damage to your target with 5 orbs
{{champion:68}} {{item:3115}} gives you some legit reason to overheat. Tank items are recommended.

Tanky Urgot adc, rush tear, then zzrot, ninja tabi,  black cleaver, manamune, iceborn gauntlet,frozen mallet. The early tankyness really works well against most bot lanes and your passive makes it even better
{{champion:111}} {{item:3094}}
burst nautilus is the best
